summary:
This is a Dunmer RaceMenu Preset, after downloading and extracting just place it in the directory starting at your Game folder in
Data\skse\plugins\CharGen\Presets

Enjoy please x3
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS]Drizzet Eldrazi RaceMenu Preset[/font]


[/center][size=3] ﻿ ﻿Drizzet Eldrazi was a Dunmer noble who fell from glory, well respected in Raven Rock she was cast out of her family home when it was discovered that she had begun to dabble in necromancy, experimenting on dead, undead, and even the living, she fled to Skyrim and its harsh climates finding it quite uncomfortable in the cold weather, she took up a home in solitude using an alias that even I the narrator will not disclose, After some time she mastered the necro-arts and used them in combat to call forth her foes shed defeated with flame, to fight under her command as a battle mage doing odd jobs for the Jarl, in an attempt to rebuild her family's name.


[center][font=Comic Sans MS]My Second Upload I got a couple kind comments on the first one I made so I decided to make another, I hope once again that someone finds this fun to use, as before if you do like it leave a comment, also i'm considering turning all the racemenu presets I create into followers, once I understand how of course =3.

[/font][/center][u]REQUIRED MODS--[/u]
﻿ Lind's Elven Eyes: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74948/?
﻿ ﻿KS Hairdos: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?
﻿ ﻿KS Hairdos Physics: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/?
[b][u]MODS TO MAKE IT LOOK LIKE THE SCREENSHOTS:
[/u][/b] ﻿ ﻿Ethereal Elven Overhaul: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273/?
﻿ ﻿CBBE: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?
﻿ ﻿Fair Skin Complexion: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?
﻿ ﻿Dalish Vallaslin Face Tattoo's for RaceMenu: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86651/? [b][i][u](possibly required, i'm not too sure)
[/u][/i][u]HONORABLE MENTIONS:
﻿ ﻿[/u][/b]Kinoko Pose - mod for posing the character: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58394/?
﻿ ﻿Schools of Magic - Mage Outfit Texture Overhaul: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69289/?
﻿ ﻿SnapDragon ENB - The ENB used for screenshots: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70451/? 

[center]﻿[/center]
[/size][center][font=Comic Sans MS]Once again thanks, and i hope you enjoy this one, ill work on learning CK so I can try to get some followers made :D

[/font]uh also there is a slight neck seem for me, might not be for you guys, if so it isn't very noticeable and i'm able to ignore it, hope it is alright for you xD[/center]
author: Raven Damara
